doc:
Mel Winkler https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mel_Winkler 0 Mel Winkler (born October 23, 1941) is an American actor. Though he mostly takes on minor live-action roles, such as Melvin in Doc Hollywood, he is probably best known as the voice of the guardian mask Aku Aku in the Crash Bandicoot series, Lucius Fox in The New Batman Adventures and Johnny Snowman in the TV series Oswald. Mel_Winkler ( born October_23_,_1941 ) is an_American_actor . Though he mostly takes on_minor_live-action_roles , such_as Melvin in Doc_Hollywood , he is_probably_best_known as the_voice of the_guardian_mask_Aku_Aku in the_Crash_Bandicoot_series , Lucius_Fox in The_New_Batman_Adventures_and_Johnny_Snowman in the_TV_series_Oswald .
